review: Unit has decent performance. I was able to stream a 8GB mkv file using xbmc sideloaded.  It did pause/buffer a few times but I think that was more of it all being over wireless.  Overall, the unit seems very responsive.  For the price, it's a nice buy .. better than the chromecast I would say.One thing that I am very disappointed in is that I left the unit off for a period of time and when I went back to use it, it refused to connect to my wireless network (no changes).  Factory resetting did not help.  From a forum post, this seems to have been a common issue that happened recently.  Have not had much more time to go back and troubleshoot the connection issue but not being able to apply an update to it without being on wireless looks to be a bigger issue now that wifi has problems.
